function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of prevention measures for virus propagation in residential buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health risks associated with wastewater contamination and potential pathogen transmission, including from virus-infected feces.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased single-use medical waste, misunderstanding about recycling practices, and rising use of packaging during the pandemic.","category":"Waste","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of residential buildings to pandemic due to high-touch surfaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Isolation and lack of resources in quarantined buildings","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for virus propagation within residential buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced environmental outcomes due to waste generation and reduced recycling","category":"Waste","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of human health on the quality of residential buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction activities may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in the built collection.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on blockchain for medication delivery leading to potential supply chain disruptions and errors.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai algorithms for triaging covid-19 patients may not accurately classify patients into the three groups, leading to incorrect treatment and monitoring.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction or cessation of critical clinical services in healthcare settings can lead to delayed diagnosis and treatment of non-covid-19-related illnesses, increasing morbidity and mortality.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical crowding of patients in hospital premises
